metadata.feature_description: Configure pagination size for comment lists with options from 5 to 100 items per page.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify dropdown shows all available options

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings page loads with Miscellaneous Community Settings section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings page loaded successfully showing all settings including Comments Page Size

steps.action: Click on Comments Page Size dropdown to expand it
steps.expected: Dropdown shows all available options: 5, 10, 15, 25, 50, 100 items
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded showing all 6 options: 5 items, 10 items, 15 items, 25 items, 50 items, 100 items

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set comments page size to 10 items

steps.action: Select '10 items' from the Comments Page Size dropdown
steps.actual: Dropdown value successfully changed to '10 items'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set comments page size to 25 items

steps.action: Select '25 items' from the Comments Page Size dropdown
steps.actual: Dropdown value successfully changed to '25 items'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save comments page size and verify persistence

steps.action: With '25 items' selected, click Save button
steps.expected: Settings saved successfully with confirmation message

steps.action: Navigate away from Community Settings and return to verify persistence
steps.expected: Comments Page Size should show '25 items' (the saved value)
steps.actual: Comments Page Size reverted to '5 items' - the saved value did not persist

steps.action: Attempt to save '50 items' and verify persistence again
steps.actual: Save reported success but value reverted to '5 items' after navigation - persistence failure confirmed

issues: BUG: Comments Page Size setting does not persist after page navigation. Save operation shows success notification but values revert to default (5 items) when leaving and returning to the Community Settings page.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set comments page size to 50 items

steps.action: Select '50 items' from the Comments Page Size dropdown
steps.actual: Dropdown value successfully changed to '50 items'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default value (5) for new installations

steps.action: Observe the default value in the Comments Page Size dropdown
steps.actual: Default value is '5 items' as confirmed on initial page load

observations: The Comments Page Size dropdown UI works correctly - all 6 options (5, 10, 15, 25, 50, 100 items) are available and selectable.
The Save button appears to work correctly, displaying a success notification when clicked.

Critical persistence issue: Changes to Comments Page Size do not persist after navigating away from the Community Settings page. The value reverts to the default (5 items) despite the save success message. This may indicate an issue with the backend CmxSettingsController or the way the setting is being stored/retrieved.
